Sqls.Select: SELECT SG01, SG02, SG03, SG04, SG05, LHDRAM, LHCRAM, DESC FROM ( SELECT TRIM(SVLDES)||TRIM(ZCNAME)||CASE WHEN ZCSTAT='8' THEN '到期报废' ELSE '提前报废' END AS DESC, '30' AS SG01, '00' AS SG02, '1601'||TRIM(ZCCWFL) AS SG03, '' AS SG04, '' AS SG05, 0 AS LHDRAM, SUM(ZCYZ) AS LHCRAM FROM #SMG.GDZC INNER JOIN #SMG.GSV ON ZCBM=SVSGVL AND SVSGMN ='DEPT' WHERE SUBSTR(CHAR(ZCBFDTE),1,6)='201411' GROUP BY TRIM(SVLDES)||TRIM(ZCNAME)||CASE WHEN ZCSTAT='8' THEN '到期报废' ELSE '提前报废' END, '1601'||TRIM(ZCCWFL) UNION ALL SELECT TRIM(SVLDES)||TRIM(ZCNAME)||CASE WHEN ZCSTAT='8' THEN '到期报废' ELSE '提前报废' END AS DESC, '30' AS SG01, '00' AS SG02, '1602'||TRIM(ZCCWFL) AS SG03, '' AS SG04, '' AS SG05, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS LHDRAM, 0 AS LHCRAM FROM #SMG.GDZC INNER JOIN #SMG.GSV ON ZCBM=SVSGVL AND SVSGMN ='DEPT' WHERE SUBSTR(CHAR(ZCBFDTE),1,6)='201411' GROUP BY TRIM(SVLDES)||TRIM(ZCNAME)||CASE WHEN ZCSTAT='8' THEN '到期报废' ELSE '提前报废' END, '1602'||TRIM(ZCCWFL) UNION ALL SELECT TRIM(SVLDES)||TRIM(ZCNAME)||CASE WHEN ZCSTAT='8' THEN '到期报废' ELSE '提前报废' END AS DESC, '30' AS SG01, '00' AS SG02, '1606' AS SG03, '' AS SG04, '' AS SG05, SUM(ZCYZ-ZCLJZJ) AS LHDRAM, 0 AS LHCRAM FROM #SMG.GDZC INNER JOIN #SMG.GSV ON ZCBM=SVSGVL AND SVSGMN ='DEPT' WHERE SUBSTR(CHAR(ZCBFDTE),1,6)='201411' GROUP BY TRIM(SVLDES)||TRIM(ZCNAME)||CASE WHEN ZCSTAT='8' THEN '到期报废' ELSE '提前报废' END ) AS A ORDER BY DESC
